title: Coodo.xyz - Dashboard
description: After creating my Discord bot, I was eager to explore new technologies. That's when I conceived the idea of developing a web dashboard for my Discord bot. The initial version was released in May 2022. One year later, I embarked on creating the V2 of the dashboard, utilizing React and Tailwind CSSâ€”two tools I had never worked with before.

title: My Portfolio
description: After honing my skills and accumulating a diverse set of projects, I felt the need to showcase my work and talents in a more organized and accessible manner. This led me to embark on the creation of my own portfolio.
